name: RetrieveMailchimpLists
description:
Retrieve information about all Mailchimp lists.

Call this tool to obtain details about all the lists associated with a Mailchimp account.

parameters.name: fields_to_return
parameters.description: A comma-separated list of fields to return, using dot notation for sub-objects.

value_schema.description: A comma-separated list of fields to return. Reference parameters of sub-objects with dot notation.

parameters.name: exclude_fields_list
parameters.description: Comma-separated list of fields to exclude, using dot notation for sub-objects.

value_schema.description: A comma-separated list of fields to exclude. Reference parameters of sub-objects with dot notation.

parameters.name: records_to_return
parameters.description: The number of list records to return. Accepts values between 1 and 1000, with a default of 10.

value_schema.description: The number of records to return. Default value is 10. Maximum value is 1000

parameters.name: pagination_offset
parameters.description: The number of records to skip for pagination. Default is 0.

value_schema.description: Used for [pagination](https://mailchimp.com/developer/marketing/docs/methods-parameters/#pagination), this is the number of records from a collection to skip. Default value is 0.

parameters.name: created_before_date
parameters.description: Restrict response to lists created before the specified date in ISO 8601 format (e.g., 2015-10-21T15:41:36+00:00).

value_schema.description: Restrict response to lists created before the set date. Uses ISO 8601 time format: 2015-10-21T15:41:36+00:00.

parameters.name: created_after_date
parameters.description: Restrict results to lists created after this date in ISO 8601 format (e.g., 2015-10-21T15:41:36+00:00).

value_schema.description: Restrict results to lists created after the set date. Uses ISO 8601 time format: 2015-10-21T15:41:36+00:00.

parameters.name: restrict_to_lists_before_last_campaign_sent
parameters.description: Restrict results to lists created before the last campaign send date (ISO 8601 format).

value_schema.description: Restrict results to lists created before the last campaign send date. Uses ISO 8601 time format: 2015-10-21T15:41:36+00:00.

parameters.name: lists_after_last_campaign_date
parameters.description: Restrict results to lists created after the last campaign send date. Use ISO 8601 format (e.g., 2015-10-21T15:41:36+00:00).

value_schema.description: Restrict results to lists created after the last campaign send date. Uses ISO 8601 time format: 2015-10-21T15:41:36+00:00.

parameters.name: filter_by_subscriber_email
parameters.description: Restrict results to lists that include a specific subscriber's email address.

value_schema.description: Restrict results to lists that include a specific subscriber's email address.

parameters.name: sort_lists_by_field
parameters.description: Field by which to sort the list results. Choose from available list fields.

value_schema.description: Returns files sorted by the specified field.

parameters.name: sort_direction
parameters.description: Determines the order direction for the sorted results. Accepts 'asc' for ascending and 'desc' for descending.

value_schema.description: Determines the order direction for sorted results.

parameters.name: restrict_to_ecommerce_store_lists
parameters.description: Restrict results to lists containing an active, connected, undeleted ecommerce store. Expected values are 'true' or 'false'.

value_schema.description: Restrict results to lists that contain an active, connected, undeleted ecommerce store.

parameters.name: include_total_contacts
parameters.description: Set to true to return the total_contacts field, which includes an approximate count of all contacts in any state.

value_schema.description: Return the total_contacts field in the stats response, which contains an approximate count of all contacts in any state.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Mailchimp Marketing API.

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: A comma-separated list of fields to return. Reference parameters of sub-objects with dot notation.

value_schema.description: A comma-separated list of fields to return. Reference parameters of sub-objects with dot notation.

parameters.name: exclude_fields
parameters.description: A comma-separated list of fields to exclude. Reference parameters of sub-objects with dot notation.

value_schema.description: A comma-separated list of fields to exclude. Reference parameters of sub-objects with dot notation.

parameters.name: count
parameters.description: The number of records to return. Default value is 10. Maximum value is 1000

value_schema.description: The number of records to return. Default value is 10. Maximum value is 1000

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Used for [pagination](https://mailchimp.com/developer/marketing/docs/methods-parameters/#pagination), this is the number of records from a collection to skip. Default value is 0.

value_schema.description: Used for [pagination](https://mailchimp.com/developer/marketing/docs/methods-parameters/#pagination), this is the number of records from a collection to skip. Default value is 0.

parameters.name: before_date_created
parameters.description: Restrict response to lists created before the set date. Uses ISO 8601 time format: 2015-10-21T15:41:36+00:00.

value_schema.description: Restrict response to lists created before the set date. Uses ISO 8601 time format: 2015-10-21T15:41:36+00:00.

parameters.name: since_date_created
parameters.description: Restrict results to lists created after the set date. Uses ISO 8601 time format: 2015-10-21T15:41:36+00:00.

value_schema.description: Restrict results to lists created after the set date. Uses ISO 8601 time format: 2015-10-21T15:41:36+00:00.

parameters.name: before_campaign_last_sent
parameters.description: Restrict results to lists created before the last campaign send date. Uses ISO 8601 time format: 2015-10-21T15:41:36+00:00.

value_schema.description: Restrict results to lists created before the last campaign send date. Uses ISO 8601 time format: 2015-10-21T15:41:36+00:00.

parameters.name: since_campaign_last_sent
parameters.description: Restrict results to lists created after the last campaign send date. Uses ISO 8601 time format: 2015-10-21T15:41:36+00:00.

value_schema.description: Restrict results to lists created after the last campaign send date. Uses ISO 8601 time format: 2015-10-21T15:41:36+00:00.

parameters.name: email
parameters.description: Restrict results to lists that include a specific subscriber's email address.

value_schema.description: Restrict results to lists that include a specific subscriber's email address.

parameters.name: sort_field
parameters.description: Returns files sorted by the specified field.

value_schema.description: Returns files sorted by the specified field.

parameters.name: sort_dir
parameters.description: Determines the order direction for sorted results.

value_schema.description: Determines the order direction for sorted results.

parameters.name: has_ecommerce_store
parameters.description: Restrict results to lists that contain an active, connected, undeleted ecommerce store.

value_schema.description: Restrict results to lists that contain an active, connected, undeleted ecommerce store.

parameters.name: include_total_contacts
parameters.description: Return the total_contacts field in the stats response, which contains an approximate count of all contacts in any state.

value_schema.description: Return the total_contacts field in the stats response, which contains an approximate count of all contacts in any state.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
